title: Bernoulli numbers
text: Your task is to compute natural logarithm of the absolute value of theBernoulli numberfor many integer parametersN.I/O format is the same as inBINARYIO.InputArray of unsigned 32 bit integers in binary format (usefreadin C/C++)To readunsigned Nusefread(&N, sizeof(N), 1, stdin)instead of usualscanf("%u", &N)until the end of file.For each test case 2 ≤N< 232,Nis even. There will be up to 1,250,000 numbers in input file.OutputArray ofdoublesin binary format (usefwritein C/C++)To writedouble ausefwrite(&a, sizeof(a), 1, stdout)instead of usualprintf("%lf\n", a).For eachNoutput ln(|BN|) with absolute or relative error less than 10-15ExampleInput:41050Output:-3,4011973816621553754132366916069-2,58021682959232517027366160311957,277060811865704087099873424857Sample input and output are readable for your convenience!!!TL = 5 * My time
